summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ARRIS Memory & Learning System. All 39 backend API tests passed (100%). Tested: Memory Palace status, Memory store/recall/summary, Pattern Engine analysis, Learning System (record-outcome/metrics), Context Builder, and Personalization. All features available to all authenticated creators.
passed_tests: GET /api/arris/memory-palace/status returns comprehensive status with memory_palace, pattern_engine, learning_system, features
POST /api/arris/memory/store creates interaction memory with MEM- prefix ID
POST /api/arris/memory/store clamps importance to valid range [0.0, 1.0]
GET /api/arris/memory/recall returns all memories without filters
GET /api/arris/memory/recall returns pattern memories with category
GET /api/arris/memory/summary returns statistics by type with memory_health
POST /api/arris/patterns/analyze identifies patterns from proposal history
Pattern categories include success, complexity, platform
POST /api/arris/learning/record-outcome records outcome and updates metrics
GET /api/arris/learning/metrics returns prediction accuracy and learning stage
GET /api/arris/context builds rich context without proposal
GET /api/arris/context builds rich context with specific proposal
GET /api/arris/personalization returns personalized prompt additions for Elite user
Memory health score structure valid (score 0-100, status, message)
Learning stage values are valid (initializing, learning, developing, proficient, expert)
seed_data_creation: Elite user has 28 memories (4 interaction, 20 pattern, 1 preference, 1 feedback, 2 outcome), 3 proposals, memory health score 100 (excellent). Premium user starts with 0 memories.

memory_palace_status.returns: memory_palace (status, health, total_memories, by_type), pattern_engine (patterns_identified, pattern_categories), learning_system (stage, accuracy_rate, total_predictions), features (all true)

memory_store.returns: Memory with MEM- prefix ID, recall_count=0, created_at timestamp

memory_summary.returns: total_memories, by_type (count, avg_importance, total_recalls), memory_health (score, status, message)

pattern_analysis.returns: status, proposals_analyzed, patterns_identified, patterns array with category, type, title, description, confidence, recommendation

context_builder.returns: memory_context, identified_patterns, historical_performance, learning_metrics, proposal_context (with similar_proposals)

mocked_apis.pattern_confidence_scores: Algorithm-based calculation from proposal data - MOCKED
mocked_apis.learning_stage_thresholds: Based on total_predictions and accuracy_rate - MOCKED

context_for_next_testing_agent: ARRIS Memory & Learning System fully implemented and tested. Available to ALL authenticated creators (not feature-gated). Elite user (elite@poweruser.com) has: 28 memories, 20 patterns identified (success, complexity, platform categories), 2 predictions recorded (100% accuracy), memory health score 100 (excellent), learning stage 'initializing'. Memory types: interaction, proposal, outcome, pattern, preference, feedback, milestone. Pattern categories: success, risk, timing, complexity, platform. Learning stages: initializing (<5), learning (<15), developing (<30), proficient (60%+), expert (80%+). Test file: /app/tests/test_arris_memory.py
